Windows_Command: Windows Defender Firewall with Advanced Security
netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state on/off
Notes: Can be managed via Group Policy

Windows_Command: netsh advfirewall firewall show rule dir=in/out
Notes: Very detailed rule listing with filters

Windows_Command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="RuleName" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=PORT
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="RuleName" dir=in action=block protocol=TCP localport=PORT
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="RuleName" dir=in action=allow service=SERVICE
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="RuleName" dir=in action=block service=SERVICE
netsh advfirewall set allprofiles firewallpolicy blockinbound,allowoutbound
Linux_UFW_Command: sudo ufw default deny incoming; sudo ufw default allow outgoing

Windows_Command: netsh advfirewall firewall delete rule name="RuleName"
Notes: Rule deletion by name or properties

Windows_Command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="RuleName" dir=in action=allow remoteip=IP
Not directly available in basic firewall
Notes: Advanced rate limiting requires 3rd party tools

Windows_Command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles logging droplevel enable
